title: 3B/2B Single Family Home centrally located in Santa Clara
posting_body: ['Single family house centrally located in a quiet neighborhood of Santa Clara with easy access to 101, Expressways, shopping centers, and close to many high tech companies (i.e. Nvidia, Intel, Google, Apple).', 'Ride/walk 0.3 miles to the San Tomas Aquino Creek trail path.', 'Currently accepting applications.', 'Available now.', 'Interior details:', '·        Spacious remodeled kitchen with granite countertops', '·        Hardwood and tile floors throughout the house', '·        Separate laundry/pantry room with washer and dryer', '·        Full master bathroom', '·        All windows double pane', '·        Whole house fan, quickly cool down the house without the expense of AC', 'Exterior details:', '·        Includes gardener for front yard', '·        Tall mulberry tree in front of the house that provides excellent shade', '·        Large backyard with spacious pergola structure for entertaining', '·        Mature fruit trees', '·        5 large garden beds to grow your own vegetables', 'Price: $4200/month with one year lease.', 'Deposit: $4200', 'Bedrooms: 3', 'Full Bathrooms: 2', 'Sq.', 'Feet: 1182 sf', 'Lot size: 6000 sf', 'Non-smokers only.', 'No pets.', 'No sublets.', 'Tenant pays utilities.', 'Subject to application and credit approval.', 'Application fee $30.']
